feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas appropriately in separating phrases and clauses.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical choices and grammatical structures with simple sentences.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have short and straightforward sentence structures with clear coherence.

feature4.explanation: Both texts have a casual tone and use informal language.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation, lexical and grammatical features, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is moderate.
